website_summaries.verdict: Classic tall UGG boot for kids available in chestnut, grey, or black. Taller design equals greater warmth.
pros: Interior features a nice warm lining for cozy feet when temperatures get cool
Fit is comfortable and true to size
Made of quality materials that provide warmth and durability
Taller design ensures maximum protection from the elements
cons: Some complain that the boot is sized too big

customer_reviews.title: Please make these colors for grown ups!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for my daughter whose feet were always freezing. My daughter has them in a smaller size, worn them 2.5 years and now starting to split a rear seam at the same time becoming decidedly too small in the toes. I gambled that by going up a size we could get another year or two...but if they made these lavender ones in women's I would have gone for that instead. Honestly, the women's sizes in this style are really boring colors.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grady

customer_reviews.title: Love Ugg Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters have inherited my love for Uggs. Our winters are cold and snowy. Uggs keep our feet toasty warm and are oh-so-cushy-soft! They're exceptionally durable and very well constructed. The abuse these boots stand up to justify the higher price point. We love Uggs!
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: and she is able to fold the tops down to have the fun fur "cuff" as currently in style
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the boots - of course. They are well made, and she is able to fold the tops down to have the fun fur "cuff" as currently in style.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage. Ripped completely in the front after one month and lightly worn! Seemed like they were defective or something because I’ve never had uggs fall apart so quickly. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: C. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves UGG boots, we buy the kids version because she has smaller feet and they are less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Steinke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and this was definitely the best price for these over priced boots!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, my only concern is that the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, my only concern is that the color is not a advertised. They are purple, not pink as pictured here. Can I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Someone Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Feet always warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Feet always warm and dry. Will never buy any other brand. I did spray them with two coats of waterproof before wearing. Recommend cleaning and respraying before putting them away in the Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the prompt service and quality of the boots. My daughter will love them. I was truly surprised at the quick turnaround once I placed my order. I will certainly do business again!! I can't thank you enough. Happy Holidays!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best boot for comfort and warmth
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 6 in womens, ordered a size 4, fit is perfect. Beautiful magenta like color. Best boots for warmth and comfortable. Saved money buying the kids size. Highly recommend doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Like my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Like my granddaughter, " These are so so snuggly,". My grandson loves them.
customer_reviews.author: L. BENSON

customer_reviews.title: Happy 9 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves them, fit perfectly! Tried on at department store first to confirm size. Arrived very quickly, perfect condition, no issues. Happy 9yr old was jumping up and down when she saw the UGG box. The real deal.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots and wears them as much as possible. The colour is beautiful light/dusty purple and the quality is excellent. Very cozy boots that stretch with a growing foot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Great online value for what I believe to be an ...
customer_reviews.text: Great online value for what I believe to be an authentic product. Have been wearing for months and haven't run into any of the usual products encountered with knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Steinberger

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love UGG.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love UGG.. Faithful and loyal ugg wearer since the 80's Any pair, any color any style.. UGGS ARE WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.author: Lori Carlettini

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 7 in women , had to get size 5. Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ms MeeMee

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my adult daughter who wears a size 6 1/2 shoe. She loved them and wore them out:) I would suggest to treat them with the Ugg water protector. I've found my Uggs last longer when doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Hunney

customer_reviews.title: Boot ripped along seam after only wearing 5 times. Wondering if they are genuine UGGS
customer_reviews.text: one of the boots ripped along the seam after only wearing about 5 times. Have been buying and enjoying UGG boots for 15 years and have never seen this happen.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kehn

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wore these so much we ended up buying ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these so much we ended up buying another pair in navy. These absolutely last forever if you take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: abby1204

customer_reviews.title: Warm & comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of Ugg boots. They fit well, are comfortable & warm, too. I will continue to order & wear Ugg boots in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this ones. Warm and comfortable to wear, resistant to stain and very stylish. She is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots. Exactly what we were expecting. Quick shipping. They fit just a bit smaller for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hovater

customer_reviews.title: Great price! My daughter loves them & can't wait ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as I expected! Very fast shipping with my prime membership! Great price! My daughter loves them & can't wait for cooler weather to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: The boots were of excellent quality. The size and color were perfect and the item shipped very quickly. My daughter loves the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Kis

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and comfortable. She sometimes wears them folded down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, good quality authentic Ugg
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots , good quality authentic Ugg. Size was misleading. Ordered a child's 8 and received an infant/toddler 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love them....very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: love them....very comfortable! I'm an adult size 6 and children's size 4 fit perfect! they were a smidge tight when I first put them on, but after a week of wearing them they stretched a bit, so now they're perfect!! so glad I didn't go bigger. (I wear them without socks, which in my eyes is the best way to wear them)
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: My kids first
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for my girls. Wear them with pants or shorts. Long lasting with the proper care. Good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Boots look good
customer_reviews.text: It's a present. She hasn't opened it yet, but books look good
customer_reviews.author: Skv AR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: read the reviews, ordered 1 size smaller and they fit her perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These fit incredibly small around my calf, and are about 5" shorter than my previous pair- which was the exact same make, size and style. I am extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I don't think UGGS run quite as large as they used to, or maybe just not for kids. Had to send them back for bigger size that I know my daughter doesn't wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the receipt reports that she absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: agp

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Exactly what I expected from Uggs. The pink screams cute and happy person during the dark gloomy NYC weather. Tip: 1. Know exactly what your size is for kids shoes. 2. If you're in between sizes, i.e. 4.5 or 5,5: order a size down in Uggs because it stretches (they tell you that in their actual stores). Good luck and stay warm!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Ligaya

customer_reviews.title: ... women size 8 and this girls size 6 fit perfect. I also own a pair of Womens size ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women size 8 and this girls size 6 fit perfect. I also own a pair of Womens size 8 Uggs and these fit just as the women's size 8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the prefect length for my height and super comfortable around my feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' and wear a size 5. This is the prefect length for my height and super comfortable around my feet. The women's feel like floating fuzzy house slippers. This is a little better fitted to my foot without feeling tight. I pretty much live in these in the winter time. I did add an insert sole for arch support when I'm out walking for long periods. Not for slushy winter stuff. Good for nice powder snow trekking.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Tsuo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots and expected price since UGGS are not cheap
customer_reviews.author: Donald D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots, but the box was ripped. Even after taping it, it looked awful. It was a gift and embarrassing to give.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, beautiful boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Exactly what was expected of UGGs. Gorgeous color and inside is so comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 5.5- 6 adult size and the 4M kid's size fit perfectly! Love the color too.. happy fall
customer_reviews.author: Rohini

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fit, Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: They were delivered very fast, they fit like a glove. I am usually a size 6.5 to a 7 in women's but the size 4 in big kids was the perfect fit. They were packged really nicely I am looking forward to buying another color from this seller next winter!!!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Marie Imrhan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: These boots were a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. They were the perfect size and the shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Rose

customer_reviews.title: UGG Boots
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter was very pleased to get a pair of UGG boots. They fit very well and the quality,of course, was splendid.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W. Altemus

customer_reviews.title: ... was more purple than expected but I got a good deal on them so no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Shipped out when told although the color was more purple than expected but I got a good deal on them so no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Mathews

customer_reviews.title: great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and are a perfect fit for my usual ladies size 6 1/2 foot. They did turn my feet black the first couple of wears.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: not so tall anymore
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the boots are not made as tall as they used to be. Also the material inside is not as soft as it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: The real deal Holyfield
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Uggs shipped fast to me. Some others may have questioned the authenticity, but these were the real McCoy. My daughter loves them👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N.

customer_reviews.title: want to make your 10 year old grandchild happy buy her uggs
customer_reviews.text: uggs are very comfortable and go great with just about any outfit shopping on line is easy and no problems
customer_reviews.author: Lillian DiPasquale

customer_reviews.title: Upset!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rated 1 star it was for my wife .Xmas present they came in with a scuff on them this is the second item I get from amazon damage ..thinking of not buying from here anymore !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My god-daughter used this product everyday in winter 2012. This product helped keep her warm during these cold conditions. Great Product! Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: price was better than Zappos
customer_reviews.text: I love Amazon and Zappos. When I checked out the pricing with shipping and tax I saved 15.00. I'll take it! My daughter is thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Fire House Chef KY

customer_reviews.title: Ugg boots
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots but unfortunately they were to small. They are not true to size I have to go one size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not feel like an UGG. Felt like a cheap knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and never got it, at least I got my money back. And they were so cute on the picture soon I will order the bailey boot three button in hopes I get it.
customer_reviews.author: Nasarah

product_meta.title: UGG Kids' Classic Tall (Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description: For toddler sizes 6 to 12 please enter "Classic Tall Toddlers" in the search box above. For children's sizes 5 and 6 please enter "Classic Tall Big Kids" in the search box above. The popular women's Classic Tall is now available in a version for kids. 11 1/2 inches tall from floor to top The chocolate brown boot has a dark brown sole. size 7-13 is toddler sizes, sizes 1-6 are for school age children Women conversion size 2 sizes down from your normal woman size Example: If you wear size 6 in women's you order size 4 in Kids.
